description: The swamps where villagers try to escape the atrocities of the civil war offer a glimpse at the catastrophe unfolding in the world's newest country.
title: Ethnic Cleansing in South Sudan
title_page: Ethnic Cleansing in South Sudan - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Nicholas Kristof, an Op-Ed columnist and winner of two Pulitzer Prizes, brings attention to human rights abuses and social injustices around the world. Read his columns.
